Description:
The hotel is located just a few minutes from Manama and Mina Salman Port. There is a shopping mall within a 30-minute drive and the closest public transport is a mere 5-minute walk away. There is a sandy beach in the vicinity. Bahrain International Airport is approximately 80 km from the hotel.

Overlooking the Arabian Gulf, this luxurious, air-conditioned, 98-apartment hotel provides guests with the ideal home away from home. Facilities at the hotel include a lobby with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, lift access, café, restaurant and conference facilities. There is also WLAN Internet access for guests to use, as well as room and laundry services and a car park.

Each apartment is spacious, tastefully decorated and beautifully appointed with all modern conveniences. Apartments are furnished with either double or king-size beds and each apartment has an en suite bathroom with shower and bath. In-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, radio, hifi and Internet access. All apartments have their own kitchen equipped with fridge, cooker, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities. A washing machine and ironing set are also provided for guests' convenience. All apartments benefit from individually regulated air conditioning and heating and either have their own balcony or terrace.

There are 2 outdoor swimming pools and a gym at the hotel. Guests can enjoy the sauna and steam room or sunbathe on sun loungers on the sun terrace during their leisure time. There is also a golf club within a 30-minute drive.

There is a café and restaurant in the hotel. Guests are offered the choice of a breakfast buffet or continental breakfast and there is a dinner buffet. Special diets are also catered for.
